hero.title: Building <1>Reliable Digital</1> Products
hero.description: I'm a full stack engineer who enjoys turning complex requirements into clean, scalable, and maintainable web applications. Experienced in both frontend and backend development, with a strong focus on system design and real-world use cases.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know more about my journey, experience, and what drives me.
about.heading: Focused on clarity, structure, and real-world use cases.
about.p1: I'm a full stack engineer based in Indonesia with hands-on experience working on real-world and enterprise-style web applications.
about.p2: I enjoy building systems that are not only functional, but also structured, secure, and easy to maintain. I'm particularly interested in how business requirements are translated into clear workflows and well-designed systems.
about.p3: Through internships and academic projects, I've worked on features such as multi-step approval workflows, access control, and data-driven systems, collaborating closely with teams in agile environments.
